description: Navigate to Bus stop on Wo Muk Road westbound at Union Plaza in Fanling. Walk along the sidewalk of Wo Muk Road, keeping the ParknShop and the blue-and-white school building on your left. The route follows the road as it curves left and then slightly right. The destination is the bus stop located on the left side of the road.

ground_truth.target_name: Bus stop on Wo Muk Road westbound at Union Plaza in Fanling

agent_refined_route: Head south [8m] -> Turn left [42m] -> Slight right [17m]
agent_concise_description: Walk along the sidewalk of Wo Muk Road, keeping the ParknShop and the blue-and-white school building on your left. The route follows the road as it curves left and then slightly right. The destination is the bus stop located on the left side of the road.
